Sentencas: Metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells (MS-SOFCs) have been fabricated by applying phase-inversion tape-casting and atmospheric plasma spraying (APS).
Titulo: Atmospheric plasma spraying to fabricate metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells with open-channel porous metal support

Sentencas: The effect of the binder amount of the phase-inversion slurries on the microstructure development of the 430L stainless steel metal support was investigated.
Titulo: Atmospheric plasma spraying to fabricate metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells with open-channel porous metal support

Sentencas: The pore structures, the viscosity of the slurry, porosity and permeability of the as-prepared metal supports are significantly influenced by the amount of the binder.
Titulo: Atmospheric plasma spraying to fabricate metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells with open-channel porous metal support

Sentencas: NiO-scandia-stabilized zirconia (ScSZ) anode, ScSZ electrolyte and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF) cathode layers were consecutively deposited on the metal support with an ideal microstructure by APS process.
Titulo: Atmospheric plasma spraying to fabricate metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells with open-channel porous metal support

Sentencas: The effect of plasma power of the APS on the microstructure of the electrolyte and cathode was investigated.
Titulo: Atmospheric plasma spraying to fabricate metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells with open-channel porous metal support

Sentencas: A dense electrolyte layer and a porous cathode layer were successfully obtained at 40 and 6 kW of the APS plasma power, respectively.
Titulo: Atmospheric plasma spraying to fabricate metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells with open-channel porous metal support

Sentencas: MS-SOFCs, with a cell configuration of 430L/Ni-ScSZ/ScSZ/LSCF, achieved a maximum cell power density of 1079 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C using humidified H-2 as fuel and ambient air as oxidant.
Titulo: Atmospheric plasma spraying to fabricate metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells with open-channel porous metal support

Sentencas: The corresponding ohmic resistance and total resistance of MS-SOFCs was 0.14 and 0.32 omega cm(2), respectively.
Titulo: Atmospheric plasma spraying to fabricate metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells with open-channel porous metal support

Sentencas: This work demonstrates the feasibility of fabricating high-performance MS-SOFCs with economical and scalable techniques.
Titulo: Atmospheric plasma spraying to fabricate metal-supported solid oxide fuel cells with open-channel porous metal support
